content:
Sure, here's an updated menu with an additional column for fun, catchy names:

============
Menu
=================

| Item | Ingredients | Price | Cost | Fun, Catchy Name |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Gyro Tacos | Soft shell tacos, lamb gyro meat, tomato, onion, cucumber, feta cheese, tzatziki sauce | $8 | $2.50 | Greek on the Streets |
| Greek Quesadilla | Flour tortilla, chicken or beef gyro meat, feta cheese, sautéed onions and bell peppers, hummus | $9 | $3.25 | Feta-tilla |
| Falafel Burrito | Flour tortilla, falafel, Mediterranean rice, lettuce, tomato, onion, feta cheese, chipotle tahini sauce | $10 | $2.75 | Falafelito |
| Greek Street Corn | Grilled corn on the cob, feta cheese spread, paprika, oregano | $5 | $1.25 | Athena's Corn |
| Lamb Souvlaki Wrap | Pita bread, lamb skewers, tomato, onion, cucumber, tzatziki sauce | $8 | $3.50 | Zeus Wrap |
| Taco Pita | Pita bread, ground beef or chicken gyro meat, lettuce, tomato, onion, feta cheese, salsa | $9 | $2.75 | Tzatz-Taco |
| Greek Nachos | Pita chips, chicken gyro meat, feta cheese, hummus, tzatziki sauce | $10 | $2.75 | Opa! Nachos |
| Mexican Greek Salad | Lettuce, tomato, cucumber, red onion, black olives, feta cheese, Greek dressing, tortilla strips | $7 | $2.25 | Med Mex Salad |
| Spanakopita Quesadilla | Flour tortilla, spinach and feta cheese filling, tzatziki sauce | $8 | $2.75 | Spinachita Quesadilla |
| Baklava Churros | Churros, baklava filling, honey, cinnamon | $6 | $1.50 | Baklavachurros |

Note that the fun, catchy names listed are just for example purposes, and you can come up with your own creative names that reflect your brand and menu items. Also, as before, the prices and costs listed are just for example purposes, and you should adjust them according to your own costs and pricing strategy.
